group.pals.android.lib.ui.filechooser.bean
Class FileContainer

java.lang.Object
  group.pals.android.lib.ui.filechooser.bean.FileContainer

public class FileContainer
extends Object

This class is used to wrap File

Because a File equals to another one which has same pathname, so we can't use File in a history list. For example:
- 1-2-3-2-4-5 -> List.indexOf(Object) will always return 1 for "2", even we have two "2"'s.

So FileContainer is used to distinguish the position of files in a List.

Author:
Hai Bison
